name: Sales Invoice custom table
script:
frappe.ui.form.on('Sales Invoice', { refresh: function (frm) { // Fetch default currency let currency = frappe.defaults.get_default("currency"); frappe.call({ method: 'agarwals.utils.invoice_reference.get_sales_invoice_references', args: { doc_name: frm.doc.name, jv_ac_name: 'Debtors - A' }, callback: function (r) { // Function to format amounts as currency function formatCurrency(amount) { return amount.toLocaleString(currency, { style: 'currency', currency: currency }); } // Cal culate the totals for each amount let total_settled_amount = 0; let total_disallowance_amount = 0; let total_tds_amount = 0; let total_writeoff_amount = 0; let sales_invoice_reference = r.message[0]; sales_invoice_reference.forEach(row => { total_settled_amount += row.settled_amount || 0; total_disallowance_amount += row.disallowance_amount || 0; total_tds_amount += row.tds_amount || 0; total_writeoff_amount += row.writeoff_amount || 0; }); let settled_amount = `
${formatCurrency(total_settled_amount)}
`; let disallowance_amount = `
${formatCurrency(total_disallowance_amount)}
`; let tds_amount = `
${formatCurrency(total_tds_amount)}
`; let writeoff_amount = `
${formatCurrency(total_writeoff_amount)}
`; frm.get_field('custom_settled_amount').html(settled_amount); frm.get_field('custom_disallowance_amount').html(disallowance_amount); frm.get_field('custom_tds_amount').html(tds_amount); frm.get_field('custom_writeoff_amount').html(writeoff_amount); // Generate HTML table using provided Bootstrap structure let sales_invoice_table_html = `
Entry Type
Entry Name
UTR Date
UTR Number
Settled Amount
TDS Amount
Disallowance Amount
Allocated Amount
Write Off
Created Date
`; sales_invoice_reference.forEach((row) => { sales_invoice_table_html += `
${row.entry_type}
${row.entry_name}
${row.utr_date}
${row.utr_number}
${formatCurrency(row.settled_amount)}
${formatCurrency(row.tds_amount)}
${formatCurrency(row.disallowance_amount)}
${formatCurrency(row.allocated_amount)}
${formatCurrency(row.writeoff_amount)}
${row.created_date}
`; }); sales_invoice_table_html += `
`; frm.get_field('custom_referencetable').html(sales_invoice_table_html); // Create Matcher Reference HTML table let matcher_reference = r.message[1]; let matcher_reference_html = `
No.
ID
Matcher Logic
Settlement Advice
Claimbook
`; matcher_reference.forEach((row, index) => { matcher_reference_html += `
${index + 1}
${row.matcher_id}
${row.matcher_logic}
${row.settlement_advice}
${row.claimbook}
`; }); matcher_reference_html += `
`; frm.get_field('custom_reference_matcher').html(matcher_reference_html); } }); } });
